1. Buy now or wait? What to know as tariffs loom on food, tech, apparel  The Washington Post
  2. Will tariffs drive more people to shop secondhand? It's a mixed bag, experts say  NPR
  3. You have 89 days. From clothes to electronics and appliances, here's what you should stock up on before Trump's tariffs pause ends in July  Fortune
  4. Amid Trump Tariffs, What Should Consumers Stock Up On?  Time Magazine
  5. Which Items Will Become More Expensive During Trump's Trade War With China?  Investopedia
